# isWaterLockEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the water lock is enabled.

## Declaration

```swift
var isWaterLockEnabled: Bool { get }
```

## Accessing Water Resistance and Lock

- **waterResistanceRating**: The Apple Watch water-resistance rating.
- **WKWaterResistanceRating**: Values indicating the water-resistance rating.
- **enableWaterLock()**: Disables the Apple Watch touch screen to prevent accidental taps while submerged.

items.description: Disables the Apple Watch touch screen to prevent accidental taps while submerged.
